title: BHIM UPI, Money Transfer, Recharge & Bill Payment
description:
About
MobiKwik is a truly Indian payments app. Use MobiKwik for mobile prepaid recharge, postpaid bill payment, utility bills, electricity bill payments, water bill payment, DTH recharge, merchant transactions & Insurance payments. Transfer money from bank to bank instantly. Also use it for financial services. Avail insurance, invest in digital gold & mutual funds & get instant personal loan. Use MobiKwik & go vocal for local.
Mobile Recharge
MobiKwik is the most preferred app to make mobile recharge. Airtel recharge, Vodafone recharge, Jio recharge, Idea recharge, BSNL recharge & any other online recharge can be done via MobiKwik. You also get mobile recharge offers on MobiKwik. Recharge offers include discounts, SuperCash & Cashback.
DTH Recharge
MobiKwik is users’ go to dth recharge app for online dth recharge. Use it for tata sky recharge, airtel dth, videocon d2h recharge, dish tv recharge, sun direct recharge, data card recharge & metro card recharge. Avail exclusive DTH recharge offers on MobiKwik. DTH offers on MobiKwik include SuperCash & Cashback.
Money Transfer
MobiKwik also offers money transfer services. Make money transfer to bank account, wallet to wallet & money transfer all bank. It is the best money transfer app.
UPI
Make fast bank to bank BHIM UPI money transfer with MobiKwik. It facilitates instant & extremely secure money transfers & hence is users’ go to app for UPI.
Bill Payment
Make fast utility bill payments with MobiKwik. It is the best bill payments app to make fast postpaid bill payment, electricity bill payment, gas bill payment, water bill payment, landline bill payment, municipality bill payment, credit card bill payment, traffic challan payment, broadband bill payment, gas booking, cable bill payment & more. MobiKwik also provides exclusive broadband bill payment offers.
b>Offline Payments Make instant payments at partner outlets like restaurants, pharmacies, milk booths, kirana stores, petrol pumps etc. with QR code scanning, UPI money transfer or wallet payment. MobiKwik is accepted at all brand stores including Reliance Fresh, Samsung & JIO stores, Apollo pharmacy & more.
Online Payments
Order groceries, medicines, food, gadgets online & pay via MobiKwik. Make quick online payments at your favorite shopping, food delivery, travel & gaming brands including Myntra, Shopclues, Zomato, Swiggy, Dream11 & more. Payments can also be made for subscriptions & at entertainment sites/apps such as Disney+Hotstar, AltBalaji, Gaana, BookMyshow & more.
Instant Loan
Get instant personal loan online up to ₹5 Lakh. Interest rates starting at low as 12%-39% p.a. with a tenure of 6 months-12 months. The standard processing fees vary from 2 -2.5%.
Example : Loan Amount: ₹50,000
Interest rate (APR): 16% p.a.
Total interest paid: ₹4444 (EMI : ₹4537)
Processing Fees (2%): ₹1,000
Insurance
Insure yourself at pocket friendly premiums. Insurance policies & insurance covers available on MobiKwik are digitally issued. A wide variety of insurance covers are available on MobiKwik including life insurance, accidental insurance, cyber insurance, coronavirus cover, cancer protect, mediclaim & other health & general covers.
Mutual Funds
Invest in the right mutual fund including Axis Mutual Fund, ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund, HDFC Mutual Fund & more. Do real time tracking & manage your mutual funds. Invest in ELSS & SIP.
Digital Gold
Invest in digital gold with MobiKwik. See the real time cost & buy & sell gold according to your need. Investment in gold can also be done via Gold SIP. Exchange digital gold with physical gold through Caratlane & SafeGold.
Gift Card
Buy MobiKwik Gift Cards for your favorite brands & save extra 5% with SuperCash.
Expense Manager
Track all your expenses & get summarised expense data on daily, monthly or weekly basis as per your needs.
